vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Craddock Park Playground Replacement Project located at 4600 Lemmon Avenue; the Munger Park Shade Replacement Project located at 5300 Junius Street; and Central Square Park Playground Replacement Project located at 3000 Swiss Avenue - Henneberger Construction Inc., lowest responsible bidder of three - Not to exceed $218,100.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
vote.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Craddock Park Playground Replacement Project located at 4600 Lemmon Avenue; the Munger Park Shade Replacement Project located at 5300 Junius Street; and Central Square Park Playground Replacement Project located at 3000 Swiss Avenue - Henneberger Construction Inc., lowest responsible bidder of three - Not to exceed $218,100.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
